title: What is the process to turn lead into gold according to alchemical philosophy?
first_phrase: In this last part, the conversation continues with Bocosto praising the author's explanation of the alchemical process, while Bele hopes that the disciples will have the grace to listen and understand. The author emphasizes the imperfection of all metals, but urges to turn lead white, remove the red from tin, and redden the moon. He emphasizes the uniqueness of their metals, obtained from their own mine. The text ends with Bocosto's appreciation and willingness to help future readers.

last_phrase: In conclusion, it is important to understand that the process of transforming lead to gold is not only a physical process but also a spiritual one. By removing the impurities and allowing the spirit to flow, we can achieve great things. Patience, perseverance and understanding the nature of things will help us on this journey.
